      StringretrieveState()

      This method will provide the widget with the current state of the component.
      The widget will store this data for later retrieval.

      voidsetStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!)

      The widget will call this method to register itself for state changes of the component.
      The method should set a callback that calls the method 'methodName' on 'callable!', whenever the state changes.
      Event should be a BBjCustomEvent.

      • retrieveState

        public String retrieveState()

        This method will provide the widget with the current state of the component.
        The widget will store this data for later retrieval.

        Returns:
        String containing the current state of all columns

      • setStateChangeCallback

        public void setStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!)

        The widget will call this method to register itself for state changes of the component.
        The method should set a callback that calls the method 'methodName' on 'callable!', whenever the state changes.
        Event should be a BBjCustomEvent.

        Parameters:
        methodName!
        callable!
